title: Create Free Account *Automated*
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is launched
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Settings AND sees a Create FREE account button 
AND selects/activates it
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to the Create Free Account page (additional tests covered in separate section)

title: Free Account - Email Address - character limit . *Automated*
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is launched
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Settings 
AND sees a Create FREE account button 
AND selects/activates it 
AND selects/activates 'Email Address' field
custom_expected: THEN the user can enter an email address that is 32 total characters in length or greater

title: Appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has obtained the current design reference
AND all of the approved copy
AND the user is viewing the Create Account Page
custom_steps: WHEN observing the Create Account Page
custom_expected: THEN all design and all copy appear as expected

title: Descriptive Text
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the app has been launched
AND the user is NOT logged in
AND we are viewing the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to Create a FREE account button
custom_expected:
THEN we see "Create a FREE MLB.com account To watch the Free Game of the Day" header text 
AND all other copy matches design text - see https://zpl.io/adoY9pV

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt in newsletter
custom_preconds:
Freshly installed app is launched
User is not logged in
User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account page
User has a test email account that can be accessed
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an email address 
AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number 
AND confirm password
custom_expected:
THEN the app logs the user in 
AND returns to Settings 
AND the user's email account is set to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must send the email account to team member with Rodeo access (Crabtree, LaSan) to confirm that it has been tagged with opt-in group “428”

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - opt out of newsletter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account page
AND User has a test email account that can be accessed
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an email address 
AND create a PW 8-15 characters in length with at least one upper-case letter, one lowercase letter and one number 
AND confirm password
custom_expected:
THEN the app logs the user in 
AND returns to Settings 
AND the user's email account does not show an opt-in to receive the newsletter To confirm this, user must send the email account to team member with Rodeo access (Crabtree, LaSan) to confirm that it has __NOT__ been tagged with opt-in group “428”

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an invalid email 
AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay: _Invalid Email - Please enter a valid email address_ 
AND this can be dismissed AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Length
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a valid email address 
AND any password in violation of the requirements - 8-15 Characters in length, one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter 
AND we activate Sign In __Note: App input does not allow passwords >15 characters in length__
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password Length - Password must be at least 8 and no more than 15 characters_ 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Bad Format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter a valid email address 
AND any password 8-15 Characters in length BUT in violation of the requirements (missing requirement of one number, at least one upper-case & one lower-case letter) 
AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay for length violation: _Password too simple - Password must at east one character, one number, one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter_ 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Create Account Failure - Existing Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User has advanced through Onboarding flow to Create Account Page
AND the user has a pre-registered MLB.com account ready
custom_steps:
WHEN we enter an existing MLB.com email 
AND any password 8-15 Characters in length & proper format (one number/upper-case letter/lower-case letter) 
AND we activate Sign In
custom_expected:
THEN the app shows an error overlay: _TBD - Registration Failure_ 
AND this can be dismissed 
AND the user is returned to Create Account Page

title: Cancel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User is viewing Settings > Create a FREE Account page

title: Back Via Menu Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Freshly installed app is launched
AND User is not logged in
AND User is viewing Settings > Create a FREE Account page
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the Menu button on the tvOS remote
custom_expected: THEN the app jumps back Settings
